trans-unit.source: As Ob Nixilis closed in, Halo swept through Giada like an electrical current, and inside her, something long dormant unfurled its wings.

trans-unit.target: 联手～每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则改为抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "It's delightful, the things their owners reveal when they think no one is listening."
trans-unit.target: 「它们的主人毫无戒心地自言自语，里头透露的事情可真有意思。」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·183 | Endless Detour | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After diverting around the eleventh construction barrier, the taxi driver began to suspect she was being herded into a trap.
trans-unit.target: 绕过第十一道路障后，出租车司机开始怀疑自己是否被带进了陷阱。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·184 | Evelyn, the Covetous | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evelyn, the Covetous
trans-unit.target: 贪婪的艾弗琳

trans-unit.resname: SNC·184 | Evelyn, the Covetous | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: SNC·184 | Evelyn, the Covetous | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Evelyn, the Covetous or another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, exile the top card of each player's library with a collection counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当贪婪的艾弗琳或另一个吸血鬼在你的操控下进战场时，放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌，且其上有一个收藏指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·184 | Evelyn, the Covetous | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Once each turn, you may play a card from exile with a collection counter on it if it was exiled by an ability you controlled, and you may spend mana as though it were any color to cast it.
trans-unit.target: 限每回合一次，如果放逐区中某张其上有收藏指示物的牌是以由你操控的异能放逐，则你可以从放逐区中使用之，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放它的费用。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·185 | Exotic Pets | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exotic Pets
trans-unit.target: 奇异宠物

trans-unit.resname: SNC·185 | Exotic Pets | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 blue Fish creature tokens with "This creature can't be blocked." Then for each kind of counter among creatures you control, put a counter of that kind on either of those tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1蓝色的鱼衍生生物，且具有「此生物不能被阻挡。」然后为由你操控的生物上每种指示物各进行以下流程～在前述衍生物之一上放置一个同类的指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·185 | Exotic Pets | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Investigators observed that Altonio's beloved fish were thriving after his disappearance.
trans-unit.target: 调查员观察到，自从阿托尼奥失踪后，他珍爱的鱼变得格外活跃。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Falco Spara, Pactweaver
trans-unit.target: 织契魔冯柯斯帕拉

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Falco Spara, Pactweaver enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 织契魔冯柯斯帕拉进战场时上面有一个后盾指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·186 | Falco Spara, Pactweaver | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells from the top of your library by removing a counter from a creature you control in addition to paying their other costs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶施放咒语，但在其他费用以外，还须从由你操控的生物上移去一个指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fatal Grudge
trans-unit.target: 致命怀恨

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个非地永久物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent and sacrifices it.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各选择一个由其操控的永久物，且其须与所牺牲永久物具有共通的牌张类别，并将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·187 | Fatal Grudge | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fleetfoot Dancer
trans-unit.target: 迅步舞者

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample, lifelink, haste
trans-unit.target: 践踏，系命，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: SNC·188 | Fleetfoot Dancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Vanto Beatdown began as an improvised dance-battle at the Rose Room lounge. When word spread of how many were slain at the first event, it became a citywide obsession.
trans-unit.target: 万通斗舞最初是蔷薇间的一种即兴舞蹈对决。第一场舞会的死亡人数传开后，它便开始风靡全城。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forge Boss
trans-unit.target: 熔炉主管

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice one or more other creatures, Forge Boss deals 2 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个或数个其他生物时，熔炉主管向每位对手各造成2点伤害。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·189 | Forge Boss | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Big furnace like this can reduce anything to ash. You got something you need reduced to ash?"
trans-unit.target: 「任何东西进了这样的大型熔炉都会烧成灰。你有什么要烧成灰的东西吗？」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glamorous Outlaw
trans-unit.target: 迷人狂徒

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Glamorous Outlaw enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 当迷人狂徒进战场时，它向每位对手各造成2点伤害且你占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·190 | Glamorous Outlaw | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Exile Glamorous Outlaw from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}" until Glamorous Outlaw is cast from exile. You may cast Glamorous Outlaw for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你手上放逐迷人狂徒：直到从放逐区施放迷人狂徒为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{U}，{B}或{R}。」于迷人狂徒持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hostile Takeover
trans-unit.target: 敌意接管

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 至多一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为1/1直到回合结束。至多另一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。然后敌意接管对所有生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·191 | Hostile Takeover | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis smiled. It had been over one thousand years since his last conquest.
trans-unit.target: 欧尼希兹笑了。距离他上一次征服已经过了千年有余。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Incandescent Aria
trans-unit.target: 炽热咏叹调

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Incandescent Aria deals 3 damage to each nontoken creature.
trans-unit.target: 炽热咏叹调对每个非衍生物的生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·192 | Incandescent Aria | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the assassins converged on Kitt Kanto, she struck a high note and held it, unbroken, for nearly a minute. When the room fell silent, she was surrounded only by rose petals falling gently to the floor.
trans-unit.target: 刺客们将琪特坎托团团包围，此时只闻她嗓音朝上翻了两番，竟长达一分钟毫无间断。随后屋内重归寂静，唯有轻轻洒落的玫瑰花瓣簇拥着女伶。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jetmir, Nexus of Revels
trans-unit.target: 欢宴魔杰米尔

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have vigilance as long as you control three or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控三个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+0且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have trample as long as you control six or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控六个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·193 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have double strike as long as you control nine or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控九个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有连击异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jetmir's Fixer
trans-unit.target: 杰米尔的息事人

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {R}{G}: Jetmir's Fixer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Jetmir's Fixer instead.
trans-unit.target: {R}{G}：杰米尔的息事人得+1/+1直到回合结束。如果起动此异能时支付过来自珍宝的法术力，则改为在杰米尔的息事人上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·194 | Jetmir's Fixer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When you lose Jetmir's trust, his family makes sure you lose everything else.
trans-unit.target: 如果你失去了杰米尔的信任，他的家族便会确保你失去一切。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second
trans-unit.target: 杰米尔副手金妮斐

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If you would create one or more tokens, you may instead create that many 2/2 green Cat creature tokens with haste or that many 3/1 green Dog creature tokens with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将派出一个或数个衍生物，则你可以改为派出等量的2/2绿色、具敏捷异能的猫衍生生物或等量的3/1绿色、具警戒异能的狗衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·195 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She watches Jetmir's back while her companions watch hers.
trans-unit.target: 她替杰米尔提防暗算，她的众多同伴则替她提防暗算。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·196 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lagrella, the Magpie
trans-unit.target: 鹊姐莱格丽

trans-unit.resname: SNC·196 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Lagrella, the Magpie enters the battlefield, exile any number of other target creatures controlled by different players until Lagrella leaves the battlefield. When an exiled card enters the battlefield under your control this way, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 当鹊姐莱格丽进战场时，选择任意数量其他目标生物，且其操控者须各不相同。放逐这些生物，直到莱格丽离开战场为止。当一张已放逐的牌以此法在你的操控下进战场时，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord Xander, the Collector
trans-unit.target: 收集魔尚夺尔勋爵

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Lord Xander, the Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent discards half the cards in their hand, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 当收集魔尚夺尔勋爵进战场时，目标对手弃一半数量的手牌，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Lord Xander attacks, defending player mills half their library, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 每当尚夺尔勋爵攻击时，防御牌手磨其牌库一半数量的牌，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·197 | Lord Xander, the Collector | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Lord Xander dies, target opponent sacrifices half the nonland permanents they control, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 当尚夺尔勋爵死去时，目标对手牺牲一半数量由其操控的非地永久物，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·198 | Maestros Ascendancy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Maestros Ascendancy
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟霸权

trans-unit.resname: SNC·198 | Maestros Ascendancy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature in addition to paying its other costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语，但在其他费用以外，还须牺牲一个生物。如果以此法施放的咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Maestros Charm
trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟护符

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: •检视你牌库顶的五张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: •每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·199 | Maestros Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Maestros Charm deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: •绝艺盟护符对目标生物或鹏洛客造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.target: 绝艺盟崇魔者

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch, haste
trans-unit.target: 死触，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当绝艺盟崇魔者攻击时，若你未操控魔鬼衍生生物，则派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，其为已横置且正进行攻击，并具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: SNC·200 | Maestros Diabolist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Where did I find my horned friend? Now there's a story worth telling. . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「我是在哪里找到这位长角朋友？这故事我可得好好讲一讲…」

trans-unit.source: Masked Bandits
trans-unit.target: 蒙面盗匪

trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·201 | Masked Bandits | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {2}, Exile Masked Bandits from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}" until Masked Bandits is cast from exile. You may cast Masked Bandits for as long as it remains exiled.
trans-unit.target: {2}，从你手上放逐蒙面盗匪：直到从放逐区施放蒙面盗匪为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{B}，{R}或{G}。」于蒙面盗匪持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Meeting of the Five
trans-unit.target: 五霸会晤

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exile the top ten cards of your library. You may cast spells with exactly three colors from among them this turn. Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with exactly three colors.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的十张牌。本回合中，你可以从其中施放正好为三色的咒语。加{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}。此法术力只能用来施放正好为三色的咒语。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·202 | Meeting of the Five | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For years, the five families ruled New Capenna in uneasy peace, and the city prospered.
trans-unit.target: 多年来，五大家族统治着新卡佩纳，此城在脆弱的和平中繁荣发展。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Metropolis Angel
trans-unit.target: 大都会天使

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack with one or more creatures with counters on them, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你以一个或数个其上有指示物的生物攻击时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·203 | Metropolis Angel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Angels are living proof that power does not always lead to corruption."\n—Elspeth
trans-unit.target: 「力量并不一定会导致腐败，天使便是活生生的例子。」 ～艾紫培

trans-unit.source: Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder
trans-unit.target: 蛮石欧菲奥先生

trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，将目标生物的力量加倍直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·204 | Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once he was jumped by a dozen Maestros agents. You can still see their imprints in the pavement if you know where to look.
trans-unit.target: 有次他遭到一伙绝艺盟密探突袭。如果你知道大致位置，现在还能见到那伙密探在水泥路里的样子。

trans-unit.target: 巧手窃犯

trans-unit.resname: SNC·205 | Nimble Larcenist | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: SNC·205 | Nimble Larcenist | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 当巧手窃犯进战场时，目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张神器，瞬间或法术牌，并放逐该牌。

trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis, the Adversary
trans-unit.target: 魔头欧尼希兹

trans-unit.target: 催命X。该复制品不是传奇，且起始忠诚为X。（于你施放此咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量为X的生物。当你如此作时，复制此咒语。所成之复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·206 | Ob Nixilis, the Adversary | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: +1: Each opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. If you control a Demon or Devil, you gain 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: SNC·206 | Ob Nixilis, the Adversary | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: Obscura Ascendancy
trans-unit.target: 秘闻帮霸权

trans-unit.resname: SNC·207 | Obscura Ascendancy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is equal to 1 plus the number of soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, put a soul counter on Obscura Ascendancy, then create a 2/2 white Spirit creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，若其法术力值等同于秘闻帮霸权上的灵魂指示物数量加1，则在秘闻帮霸权上放置一个灵魂指示物，然后派出一个2/2白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·207 | Obscura Ascendancy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as there are five or more soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, Spirits you control get +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 只要秘闻帮霸权上有五个或更多灵魂指示物，由你操控的精怪便得+3/+3。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·208 | Obscura Charm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obscura Charm
trans-unit.target: 秘闻帮护符

trans-unit.resname: SNC·208 | Obscura Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one —
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: SNC·208 | Obscura Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Return target multicolored permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: •将目标法术力值等于或小于3的多色永久物牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·208 | Obscura Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
trans-unit.target: •反击目标瞬间或法术咒语。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·208 | Obscura Charm | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Destroy target creature or planeswalker with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标法术力值等于或小于3的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·209 | Obscura Interceptor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Obscura Interceptor enters the battlefield, it connives. When it connives this way, return up to one target spell to its owner's hand. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)
trans-unit.target: 当秘闻帮拦截者进战场时，令它筹谋。当它以此法筹谋时，将至多一个目标咒语移回其拥有者手上。（某生物筹谋的流程是抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃的牌不是地，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: SNC·231 | Ziatora, the Incinerator | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, Ziatora, the Incinerator deals damage equal to that creature's power to any target and you create three Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。当你如此作时，焚炎魔齐朵拉对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲生物的力量，且你派出三个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·232 | Ziatora's Envoy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ziatora's Envoy
trans-unit.target: 齐朵拉的使节

trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: SNC·232 | Ziatora's Envoy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Ziatora's Envoy deals combat damage to a player, look at the top card of your library. You may play a land from the top of your library or cast a spell with mana value less than or equal to the damage dealt from the top of your library without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当齐朵拉的使节对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你的牌库顶牌。你可以从你的牌库顶使用一张地牌，或从该处施放一个法术力值等于或小于所造成伤害之数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你皆未作，则将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·232 | Ziatora's Envoy | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 当勤工联高台进战场时，将它牺牲。当你如此作时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的沼泽，山脉或树林牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·255 | Riveteers Overlook | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Along the outer girders, in gold filigree, are inscribed the names of all those who fell to their deaths during construction.
trans-unit.target: 外梁上有许多以丝金雕刻的名字，这些都是建设过程中失足丧命者。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·282 | Elspeth Resplendent | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −3: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a shield counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: −3：检视你牌库顶的七张牌。你可以将其中一张法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌放进战场，且上面有一个后盾指示物。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.target: −7：派出五个3/3白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: +2：你可以牺牲一个生物。若你如此作，则从你牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，且其法术力值须等同于所牺牲之生物的法术力值加1，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: +1: Mill five cards, then put any number of creature cards milled this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: +1：磨五张牌，然后将任意数量以此法磨掉的生物牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·284 | Ob Nixilis, the Adversary | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
